Others: Shimron Hetmyer returns to the West Indies squad for the upcoming ODI series against England.
Hetmyer has been included in the team in place of Alick Athanje.
The first ODI between West Indies and England will be played in Antigua on October 31, 2024.
West Indies made only one change compared to the team sent on the Sri Lanka tour and included Hetmyer.
Hetmyer did not participate in the Sri Lanka tour due to personal reasons.
Hetmyer recently performed well in the Caribbean Premier League, where he was the fifth top-run scorer.
Hetmyerâ€™s return will strengthen the batting order of the Caribbean team.
Liam Livingstone will lead the England team as regular captain Jos Buttler is busy recovering from a calf injury.
West Indies head coach Darren Sammy expressed excitement about the upcoming ODI series.
